text:
💉 The #EU 🇪🇺 has bought up to 300 million extra #Covid19 vaccine doses from US firm #Moderna, Ursula von der Leyen said on Wednesday.

As @MonteReports reports, the new deal adds to the EU's #vaccine stock as it strives to fully vaccinate 70% of adults by mid-September ⤵️ https://t.co/ULAVfO3UtE
